name: Attack on the carrots
description:
You big chungus, need to jump on carrots to get points. If you get hit by a carrot you will die and your score resets.

Movment:

up - w

down - s

left - a

right - d

jump - spacebar

open source on github

https://github.com/JaspysJelly/BigChungusAttack/tree/main
